name: Slice of Scythe
description:
play as the 19-year-old cousin of Death (yes, Death with a capital D, the Grim Reaper, etc.) and terrorize suburbia. you need 4 souls and $40 shipping and handling to win

made from scratch in 72 hrs for our first ludum dare entry. please rate it here!

music & writing (@miyolophone), art (@odiiette), programming & art (cnnmon)

  • murder innocents
  • shop for groceries
  • buy a neat hat from Hell
  • fail to buy a neat hat from Hell
  • feel emotions (?)

we ran out of time so some sprites are missing and replaced with maddi. enjoy ♡
